articles.title: Paek Nam Sun meets new Beninese ambassador
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun meets new Beninese ambassador 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and had a talk with Michel Adechian, newly-appointed ambassador of Benin to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him today.
